{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Plume |model=SuperPod |revision=(B1A) |asin=B07GVJL3XH, B07GVPQG3Y |series=AC3000 |est_release_date=10/01/2018 |fcc_date=04/27/2018 |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |type=wireless system, wireless router |fcc_id=2AG7G-B1A |ic_id=21185-B1A |pcb_id=082-00786-12 |pwr_v=100-240 |pwr_amp=0.45 |pwr_conn=AC (direct) |pwr_ac_hz=50/60 |cpu1_brand=Qualcomm |cpu1_model=IPQ4019;Q, IPQ4019, 0VV, NE728TJ8, E072800; |cpu1_cspeed=716 |cpu1_cores=4 |fla1=256 |fla1_brand=Macronix |fla1_model=MX30LF2G18AC-XKI |ram1=512 |ram1_brand=Nanya |ram1_model=NT5CC256M16EP |wi1_chip1_brand=Qualcomm |wi1_chip1_model=IPQ4019 |wi1_chip2_brand=Qualcomm |wi1_chip2_model=IPQ4019 |wi1_802dot11_protocols=abgn+ac |wi1_txchains=2 |wi1_rxchains=2 |wi1_sstreams=2 |wi2_chip1_brand=Qualcomm Atheros |wi2_chip1_model=QCA9984 |wi2_802dot11_protocols=an+ac |wi2_txchains=4 |wi2_rxchains=4 |wi2_sstreams=4 |eth_cpu=true |sw_brand=Qualcomm Atheros |sw_model=QCA8072;Q, QCA8072, 0VV, PU711957, U071100; |lan_speed=1G |lan_ports=1 |wan_ports=1 |addl_chips=2.4GHz WLAN FEM;Skyworks;SKY85325-11;SKY11, 85325, 726TW;2; ,,, 5GHz FEM;Skyworks;SKY85746-11;SKY, 746, 2H00F;2; ,,, 5GHz FEM;Skyworks;SKY85748-11;SKY, 748, 2H00R;4; |flags=Bluetooth LE, DFS (master), fan, |802dot11_protocols=abgn+ac }} {{TagLine|AC3000 Tri-Band Home WiFi System}} :[https://support.plume.com/hc/en-us/sections/360001184234-Pod-SuperPod Support page] {{â€¢}} [https://support.plume.com/hc/en-us/articles/360005297914-Pod-and-SuperPod-Technical-Specifications Specifications]
"082-00786-12" is silkscreened on the board in the FCC photos. <!-- {{FCC ST|10/21/2018|indexme.}} --> <!--SuperPod is the newest member of the Plume Pod family, providing next :generation performance while working together with existing Pods. :It features two Ethernet ports and new, beautiful colors. :We are targeting a release for the SuperPod in Spring 2018. :Additional details and specifications will be provided at that time.-->
===News=== *[https://support.plume.com/hc/en-us/articles/360000493927-What-is-SuperPod- ''What is SuperPod?'' on '''Plume'''] *[http://joelberroteran.com/superpod/ ''Plume SuperPod'' on '''joelberroteran.com'''] *[https://www.engadget.com/2018/06/12/plume-second-generation-wifi-superpod/ ''Plume launches SuperPod'' on '''EnGadget''']
